name: Bambie
description:
Bambie’s life has always been plastic perfection – she’s got a great job, radical friends, and the most tubular boyfriend in town! That’s right, everything is just doll-lightful.

But wait, what’s this? The new Bambie line is a little different. It seems like the designers really want all in making these dolls the most convincing one’s ever.

That’s right: Bambie is bubblier, bustier, and hornier than ever before!

Take playing with toys to a whole new level!

Enter a fantastically realized world where hot pink hues meet hot erotic fun. From Bambie’s fashionable dream home to the fabulous local gym, enjoy set pieces that are fresh out of the box, ready to host all the groovy scenes you can imagine. Take role-play to a whole new level of fun as you bring to life your own sensual stories for Bambie and friends.

Remember – playing with dolls encourages creativity!

Friends are the best accessory!

The star of the show has always been the trendy Bambie. Known for achieving anything she sets her mind to, she’s ready to show the world that her versatility expands way past just her résumé!

Maybe Bambie wants to take a fitness session to the next level with a partner? Or, maybe, she wants to invite her diverse cast of friends over for a sleepover that’s bound to turn naughty?

With a robust game engine that allows for dozens of combinations ranging from one-on-one sessions to group play, you’re able to create scenes that never go out of style!

In Bambieland, everyone gets to play!

Enjoy an approachable erotic simulator that boasts immersive character physics and supports on-the-fly changes. Gameplay is quick to pick up and hard to put down, guiding you as you treat the dolls to levels of fun they’ve never known before. Get up close and personal as you configure your Bambie doll into the perfect positions for a fashion-tastical climax!

With no-VR compatibility for Windows, and VR support for Vive and Quest, we’ve aimed to make Bambie’s new adventures accessible to everyone who’s ready to graduate from Dress-up, to Dress-down!
